messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] chapter book/specific recommendations
messages.msgSnippet: ... The Terrible Horrible No Good Very Bad Day , main character s name is Alexander, and there are some other books about him too. Can t remember the author s
messages.messageBody:
> A book for boys that deals with sibs and middle children? Seem to remember
"The Terrible Horrible No Good Very Bad Day", main character's name is
Alexander, and there are some other books about him too. Can't remember the
author's name.

. Alexander and the terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day by Judith
Viorst. Another great one by her is My mama says there aren't any zombies,
ghosts, vampires, creatures, demons, monsters, fiends, goblins, or things.
Tia

leschke@...

"Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where
there is no path and leave a trail."
- Ralph Waldo Emerson

messages.authorName: Gary m and Mary Anne Taylor
messages.subject: chapter book/specific recommendations
messages.msgSnippet: A book for boys that deals with sibs and middle children? Seem to remember The Terrible Horrible No Good Very Bad Day , main character s name is Alexander,
messages.messageBody:
A book for boys that deals with sibs and middle children? Seem to remember "The Terrible Horrible No Good Very Bad Day", main character's name is Alexander, and there are some other books about him too. Can't remember the author's name.
Mary T.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
